members.signatureBeforeChange: @Override public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
members.signatureAfterChange: @Override public Point computeSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean changed)
diff: +	 * in GTK 3.8 computeNativeSize returning 0 for height.
+	 * So if the height is returned as zero calculate the table height
+	 * based on the number of items in the table
+	 * In case the table doesn't contain any elements,
+	 * getItemCount returns 0 and size.y will be 0
+	 * so need to assign default height
